question.title: What is the primary goal of rehydration therapy in acute diarrhoea?

option_a.title: To replace lost fluids and electrolytes

option_b.title: To treat the underlying cause of diarrhoea

option_d.title: To reduce the duration of diarrhoea

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
